attributes.title: 0.5 liter PET disposable water bottle
attributes.description:
Created on September 19, 2010 by normski on Sourcemap.org:

This Sourcemap is for an empty disposable water bottle.  The point of assembly is a guess.  A search of the Internet found several PET bottle manufacturers in India.
